channel.title: No Cats Feed
channel.description: The feed will have updates about things related to the site or about major interests of mine.

item.title: 30.8.2025: Old Art Update
item.description: The Art page now has some older art practice that I made, the kind of stuff you don't usually share. Scary!

item.title: 28.8.2025: Art and Secret Update
item.description: The Art page is finally in a shape where it is actually somewhat usable. I also hid a secret to this site, can you find it? (It's not a cat)

item.title: 27.8.2025: The RSS update
item.description: No Cats now has a RSS that works with Nekoweb's RSS features! The Nekoweb guide is also getting updated with this information.
